file.name: thing.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: /sample
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: references in property test
  description: |
    demo of how references are not handled in model property definitoins
paths:
  /things:
    x-handler: things
    get:
      operationId: search
      summary: Find things
      responses:
        '200':
          description: |
            A list of things matching the search criteria.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ThingSummary'
      description: |
        Search for a Thing given the parameters included in the query string.
  '/things/{id}':
    x-handler: things
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PathId'
    get:
      operationId: getById
      summary: Get Existing Thing
      responses:
        '200':
          description: |
            The requested Thing.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Thing'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      description: |
        Get details of a particular Thing given the Thing `id`. 
components:
  parameters:
    PathId:
      name: id
      in: path
      required: true
      description: The ID of the resource to which the call applies.
      schema:
        type: string
  responses:
    NotFound:
      description: |
        **Not Found**

        The requested resource was not found.
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiError'
  schemas:
    Address:
      required:
        - street
        - city
        - state
        - zip
      properties:
        street:
          type: string
        street2:
          type: string
        city:
          type: string
        state:
          type: string
          description: |
            State, province, mailing division, as applicable for the country.
        zip:
          type: string
          description: |
            U.S. zip code, foreign postal code, as applicable.
        country:
          type: string
      description: |
        Real-world address of property or for post.
    ApiError:
      required:
        - message
        - status
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
          description: Additional diagnostic information about the error.
        status:
          type: integer
          description: HTTP status code for the error.
        type:
          type: string
          description: A type name for the error.
    Thing:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ThingSummary'
        - type: object
          properties:
            stuff:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                source:
                  type: string
              description: |
                The stuff about the thing.
    ThingSummary:
      required:
        - ThingNumber
        - address
      properties:
        ThingNumber:
          type: string
          description: The unique identifier of this Thing.
        address:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Address'
